sentences.en: A good hostess is always attentive to the needs of her guests.
sentences.cn: 好客的女主人能随时留心客人的需要.

sentences.en: But Emmy had always been good and attentive to him.
sentences.cn: 还亏得埃米总是对他很和蔼很殷勤.

sentences.en: Everyone in the workshop stands in silence, attentive.
sentences.cn: 车间里所有的人都沉默地站着, 注意动静.

sentences.en: He had imbibed at Geneva the idea that one must always be attentive to one's aunt.
sentences.cn: 他之所以懂得应该孝顺姑母,完全是在日内瓦受到熏陶的结果.

sentences.en: He was very attentive to the ammeter.
sentences.cn: 他十分经心在意地望着电流计.

sentences.en: I felt it politic to keep my peace and play the part of the attentive listener.
sentences.cn: 我觉得保持沉默、做一名专心的听众比较明智。

sentences.en: She was very attentive to her guests.
sentences.cn: 她对客人招待得十分周到.

sentences.en: The attentive audience were listening to the English talk in the auditorium.
sentences.cn: 听众正在礼堂聚精会神地听英语报告.

sentences.en: The hotel staff are friendly and attentive.
sentences.cn: 旅馆人员友好而且照顾周到。

sentences.en: The staff is well trained in courteous and attentive service to each and every guest.
sentences.cn: 员工训练有素，为每一位客人提供礼貌周到的服务。

sentences.en: The two of them lay rapt and attentive.
sentences.cn: 他们两个趴着愣愣地凝神细听.

sentences.en: The vast majority of the attentive audience applauded these sentiments.
sentences.cn: 大多数聚精会神听讲的观众都对这些观点表示赞赏。

sentences.en: They were very solicitous and attentive to detail.
sentences.cn: 他们非常细心,十分注意细节.

sentences.en: We should be attentive to the newcomers.
sentences.cn: 我们对新来的人要亲切.

words.tran_cn: 注意地；聚精会神地；周到地

trans.tran_en: listening to or watching someone carefully because you are interested
